The God Particle
Konzerthaus Freiburg (Rolf-Böhme-Saal), Freiburg im Breisgau, Baden-Württemberg, Germany Set work, Friday 1st May, adjudicators Doss, Lys, Roberts; own choice Saturday 2nd May, adjudicators Cutt, Jeanbourquin, Nordhagen.
